info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 06 at 3:51PM EST until January 07 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 7 PM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 7 to 12 inches with 12 to 16 inches expected in the southern Greens. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph in the higher terrain areas. * WHERE...Mohawk and Schoharie Valleys, Greater Capital Region, southern Vermont, Lake George and Saratoga Region, and the Southern Adirondacks. * WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to 7 PM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult tonight due to snow covered roadways and reduced visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snowfall rates around one inch per hour at times expected tonight with one to two inches per hour likely in the southern Greens. Snow may turn moderate again during the day on Sunday with rates up to 0.5 to 1 inch per hour possible where snow bands can redevelop.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.
